items.title: Awesome Spark
items.content_text: ### Packages / Middleware * [Livy (⭐915)](https://github.com/apache/incubator-livy) - REST server with extensive language support (Python, R, Scala), ability to maintain interactive sessions and object sharing.
items.content_html:
Packages / Middleware

  • Livy (⭐915) - REST server with extensive language support (Python, R, Scala), ability to maintain interactive sessions and object sharing.

items.title: Tips
items.content_text:
## Create and switch new branch

```sh
git checkout -b <branch-name>
```

**Alternatives:**

```sh
git branch <branch-name> && git checkout <branch-name>
```

```sh
git switch -c <branch-name>
```
items.content_html:
Create and switch new branch

git checkout -b <branch-name>

Alternatives:

git branch <branch-name> && git checkout <branch-name>
git switch -c <branch-name>

items.title: Awesome Django
items.content_text:
### Third-Party Packages / Security

*   [django-csp (⭐609)](https://github.com/mozilla/django-csp) - Adds [Content-Security-Policy](http://www.w3.org/TR/CSP/) headers to Django.
items.content_html:
Third-Party Packages / Security

  • django-csp (⭐609) - Adds Content-Security-Policy headers to Django.

items.title: Awesome Php
items.content_text:
### Table of Contents / Email

*   [PHP IMAP (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/barbushin/php-imap) - A library to access mailboxes via POP3, IMAP and NNTP.

### Table of Contents / Debugging and Profiling

*   [Symfony VarDumper (⭐7.4k)](https://github.com/symfony/var-dumper) - A variable dumper component.

### Configuration / PHP Books

*   [Domain-Driven Design in PHP](https://leanpub.com/ddd-in-php) - Real examples written in PHP showcasing DDD Architectural Styles.
items.content_html:
Table of Contents / Email

  • PHP IMAP (⭐1.7k) - A library to access mailboxes via POP3, IMAP and NNTP.

Table of Contents / Debugging and Profiling

items.title: Awesome Vscode
items.content_text:
### C#, ASP .NET and .NET Core / More

*   [C#](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-dotnettools.csharp) - C# extension by [Microsoft](https://www.microsoft.com), read [official documentation](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/csharp) for the details

### Go / More

*   [Go](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=golang.Go) - Rich language support for the Go language.

### Terraform / [Smarty Template Support](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=aswinkumar863.smarty-template-support)

*   [Terraform](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=hashicorp.terraform) - Syntax highlighting, linting, formatting, and validation for Hashicorp's Terraform
items.content_html:

Go / More

items.title: Awesome Asyncio
items.content_text:
